result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin Richard Slack was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: any other sentences currently serving.

miscConds.notes:
Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by agent. 

AODA and follow up.  DNA sample.  

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

3:27 PM 
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 22CM161, 22CM385, 22CM386, and 22CM416

State appears by DDA Molly Lawrence; Defendant appears in person with Attorney Anne Katte.

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding.

State moves to: 
22CM385
COUNT 1: Bail Jumping - Misd, Repeater >> DRI.
22CM416
COUNT 1: Bail Jumping - Misd, Repeater >> DRI.
COUNT 2: Bail Jumping - Misd, Repeater >> DRI.
COUNT 3: Bail Jumping - Misd, Repeater >> DRI.

COURT GRANTS.

PLEA to: 
22CM161
COUNT 1: Disorderly Conduct, Repeater >> NO CONTEST. 
22CM386
COUNT 1: Disorderly Conduct, Repeater >> NO CONTEST. 
COUNT 2: Bail Jumping - Misd, Repeater >> NO CONTEST. 

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty.

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 18 months probation; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent; AODA and f/u; Maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol; DNA sample and surcharge; and CC. Probation to run concurrent to any other sentences currently serving. 2 days jail credit if revoked.
